[NIPSpecStyle]{.twiki-macro .INCLUDE}

\<font class=\"title\"\>LIBRARY REFERENCE: omni-comm\</font\>

\<font class=\"query\"\>CATEGORY:\</font\>
[Behavior](NIPCategoryBehavior)

\<font class=\"query\"\>WOE NAME:\</font\> Lib:NIP:lib:omni-comm

\<font class=\"query\"\>DEPENDENCIES:\</font\>
[communicate](NIPLibRefCommunicate)

\<font class=\"query\"\>COMPATIBILITY:\</font\> None/All.

\<font class=\"query\"\>INCOMPATIBILITY:\</font\> None at this point.

\<font class=\"query\"\>KNOWN ISSUES:\</font\>

Confirmed () issues with this library. (Unconfirmed issues should be
reported in the feedback section at the bottom of this document.)

\<font class=\"query\"\>FEATURES\</font\>

Witness add-on to communicate.

\<font class=\"query\"\>DESCRIPTION\</font\>

Specifically for NPC\'s which need to be particularly user-friendly (and
answer **everything**, whether it\'s addressed to them or not).

Not recommended unless the NPC is in a room alone with the player (as
other NPC\'s/players\' chatter will be responded to as well).

\<font class=\"query\"\>LIBRARY SCRIPT REFERENCE(S)\</font\>

\<font class=\"lib\"\>merry:witness:evoke%omni-comm\</font\> \<UL\>
Witness add-on script. \</UL\>

\-- Main.KalleAlm - 24 Feb 2004
